p:
Note that individuals isolating themselves without taking PCR test are considered as infecteds at large and are not included in the quarantne class. Equation (8) indicates that if λ can be determined from the time dependence of the daily confirmed new cases, β from the initial increase of infecteds and infectious period
γ
− 1
of asymptomatic patients, then the number of infected at large can be obtained from the daily confirmed new cases.
